name: Pal
description: A customized chat playground for iOS, integrating multiple LLM models like GPT, DeepSeek, Claude, etc.

content.overview: Pal is a specialized chat playground designed exclusively for iOS devices. It offers a customizable environment for interacting with multiple leading large language models including GPT, DeepSeek, Claude, and others. The application provides a native iOS experience with an intuitive interface, allowing users to seamlessly switch between different AI models while maintaining conversation context and preferences.

features.title: Multiple LLM Integration
features.description: Supports various AI models including OpenAI's GPT series, DeepSeek, Anthropic's Claude, and more

features.title: Customizable Chat Environment
features.description: Allows users to personalize their chat experience with themes, conversation styles, and model preferences

features.title: Context Preservation
features.description: Maintains conversation context when switching between different AI models

features.title: Offline Capabilities
features.description: Provides certain functionalities even when not connected to the internet

faqs.question: Which iOS devices is Pal compatible with?
faqs.answer: Pal is compatible with iPhone and iPad devices running iOS 14.0 or later, providing an optimized experience for different screen sizes.

faqs.question: Do I need to provide my own API keys?
faqs.answer: Yes, you'll need to provide API keys for the language models you wish to use. The app securely stores these keys on your device.

faqs.question: Can I use Pal on Android devices?
faqs.answer: No, Pal is currently designed exclusively for iOS devices. There is no Android version available at this time.

faqs.question: How does Pal handle my conversation data?
faqs.answer: Pal prioritizes privacy by storing conversation data locally on your device. The app only sends prompts to the respective AI model servers as needed for generating responses.
